original_text: After those, seven other groups of grain grew. Those grains were thin because the hot east wind had burned them.
korean_text: 그 후에 또 가늘고 동풍에 마른 일곱 이삭이 나더니

sentences.original_text: After those, seven other groups of grain grew.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 일곱 개의 다른 곡식 무리가 자랐다.

sentences.original_text: because the hot east wind had burned them.
